Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a clutch three-run homer to give the Mets a 3-2 lead in the top of the ninth inning
Starling Marte hit a single, scoring Jesse Winker for the insurance run
The game went into extra innings
Post-Match Reflections: Mets President of Baseball Operations David Stearns said 'we just saw one of the greatest games in Mets history'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Empire State Building changed its colors to blue and orange
Brandon Nimmo shared that his grandmother passed away prior to Game 3
Champagne is flying all over the place in the visitor's locker room at American Family Field
Polar bear takes a champagne bath
Others: J.D. Martinez was seen giving Pete Alonso a generous helping of champagne
In typical postseason fashion, Alonso didn't waste a drop of the bubbly
Francisco Lindor had to cut his postgame interview short as he rushed over to take a team picture
Lindor proceeded to pump up his teammates prior to the photo shoot
